channel.title: Hello . help with compile MS-dos batch file
channel.description:
Hi guys sorry if this is the wrong part of the forums but hey i need help . i installed the runescape server into a new folder on the dektop. i ran compile it says bad command or file name i put it into my java folder, in bin. rune compile again it now says C:\programfiles\java\jre1_1.5.0_06\bin\newfolder\20051104-server>javac* java
i did everything that the website told me to do but it still dont work. i only rune me edition on this computer though so that might be a problem
any help would be appreciated thanks martin

item.title: Hello . help with compile MS-dos batch file
item.dc:creator: @johnj98 johnj98
item.description:
@johnj98 wrote:

If you donâ€™t want to download the lasted JDK
go to C:\Program Files\java
See if you have JDK

item.title: Hello . help with compile MS-dos batch file
item.dc:creator: @pk_monk pk monk
item.description:
@pk_monk wrote:

Or your may try this one.

@echo off title PUTTHETITLEYOUWANTHERE "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Read full topic
item.source: Hello . help with compile MS-dos batch file
